data.title: Georgia Girls State
data.text:
2024 Session Completed

​

June 9 - 14, 2024 at Valdosta State University in Valdosta, GA.

​

Powerpoint Overview (PDF Version)

​

Arrival and Departure

​

Georgia Girls State will be held on the campus of Valdosta State University. The dorm's name is Georgia Hall. Report to Georgia Hall between 1:00 and 3:30 on Sunday, June 9, 2024. Make arrangements to depart on Friday, June 14, 2024, by 1:00 PM.

​

Graduation

​

Friday, June 14, 2024. Park in the VSU Oak Street Parking Deck. The Graduation is held at the Student Union.

​

Payment

ALA Units sponsoring girls shall make checks payable to Georgia Girls State. ($350.00) Put the American Legion Auxiliary Unit or Post number or Girl's name on the check. Send to:

​

American Legion Auxiliary

3035 Mt. Zion RD

Stockbridge, GA 30281

​​

Give to Girls State!

The American Legion Auxiliary believes that educating our youth about the basic ideals and principles of our system of government will help ensure the survival of our republic.
